extendedInfo.description: Bike fun and challenging tracks using your destructible stick biker including jumps, loopings, fire and other funny obstacles. Stick Stunt Biker is an agil and fast physic based bike game, with new updates every few weeks. (Stick Stunt Biker has seen more than 26 updates already)This version includes additional 16 tracks (36 in total), all bike styles, all weather modes and has no Ads!â¢ The #1 most downloaded racing game in more than 20 countries including US, UK, Australia, Austria, etc. for more than 1 year on the iPhoneâ¢ From the makers of various top 100 apps like Stickman Base Jumping, Stickman Cliff Diving, Wingsuit Stickman, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and moreâ¢ Selected by Apple for the "App Store Rewind 2011 and 2012" category for best apps and games in 2011 and 2012FEATURES:â¢ Includes 36 amazing well designed tracksâ¢ Fun ragdoll physics with destructible ragdoll (biker will shatter into parts if you crash hard enough)â¢ Destructible motor bikeâ¢ Realistic bike physicsâ¢ Realistic bike shocksâ¢ Customizable bikesâ¢ Jumps, Loopings, Walls, Glass, Sigsaw, Fire, Elevator, etc.â¢ Different difficulties from easy to bone breakingâ¢ Agil and fast reacting bike using accelerometer technologyâ¢ More than 80 achievements to unlock!â¢ Race against your own ghost! (ghost will show the best/last ride)Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possibleThank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Super stunt biker..........
reviews.comment: I say super stunt biker is a good example of a motocross game I have not been satisfyed with the motercyle games of today untill I got super stunt biker and the fact that it had a stick man just made it go that farther
reviews.author: Zane Reeder

reviews.title: Great Jobs
reviews.comment: So fun. Period, probably the funnest game on android!!.    DJINNWORKS. PLEASE UPDATE GAME WITH NEW LEVELS SOON.
reviews.author: Dino Goranovic

reviews.title: Good Job.
reviews.comment: Really fun. Most of the levels get me upset because I can\'t beat them. Sometimes I am trying to beat it for 30 minutes and still can\'t beat it so I move on. It\'s about time you put the weather on here because on the iphone store they all ready had it for years but for an extra buck. So it\'s free on here and that\'s good. I love the different bikes. Enjoyable game that doesn\'t end for a while. Good Game.
reviews.author: Mevren Camili

reviews.title: Awesomeness and a pure laughing machine!
reviews.comment: It is pure awesomeness. Keep doing what you are doing! Sometimes on apocalypse, if you position your jump just right, you\'ll get a jab in the \'\' big balls \'\'
reviews.author: John Kitto IV

reviews.title: Best game
reviews.comment: Great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game but
reviews.comment: It would be nice to have the option to restart at the check point instead of always at the beginning. Also a walk back reverse to get better run up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad Customer Service
reviews.comment: I am not sure how this app was purchased but I came home to find it installed on my Nexus 7. Since the time limit for refund from Google has expired I could not go to them. I contacted the author about the situation but no response.  At the very least a response would have been nice but I feel I was just ignored. I will not purchase anymore of this author\'s apps until I am contacted and the situation rectified.
reviews.author: Michael Buck

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I have had this game for over a year now, and I\'m still playing it all the time. Even after I beat all the levels, which took awhile actually, I still go back and try to beat my times and perfect my runs. Really a fantastic game.
reviews.author: James McClure

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very entertaining. Never have I played a platform racer like this

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: This is one of my favorite games with fantastic replay value.   Two complaints: - Engine sounds sometimes cut out and don\'t return until app reset - New courses are focused on extreme stunts, not speed. I would like more easy courses that you can gun through.
